description: Find out how Cholera can be treated.
title: How is Cholera treated?
content:
- Start giving ORS, or water if you don’t have ORS to someone who has watery diarrhoea immediately.
 - Take them to the nearest health facility without delay, continuing to give them ORS on the way
 - Continue giving breast milk only, to a baby from birth up to 6 months of age who has diarrhoea / cholera
